trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to and from other data types.
trans-unit.target: Converte instâncias de <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>de e para outros tipos de dados.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This class differs in two ways from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter>, the default type converter for the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é diferente de duas formas de <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter>, o conversor de tipos de predefinido para a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>classe.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter>

trans-unit.source: - Uses a string representation based on the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IetfLanguageTag%2A> property rather than the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> property (i.e., RFC 3066 rather than RFC 1766).
trans-unit.target: -Utiliza uma representação de cadeia com base no <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IetfLanguageTag%2A>propriedade em vez do <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A>propriedade (ou seja, RFC 3066 em vez de RFC 1766).</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IetfLanguageTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When converting from a string, the properties of the resulting <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object depend only on the string and not on user overrides set in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: -Quando converter de uma cadeia, as propriedades de resultante <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>dependem apenas a cadeia e substitui o utilizador não em conjunto no painel de controlo de objeto.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to create documents the appearance of which do not depend on local settings.
trans-unit.target: Isto torna possível criar documentos o aspeto que não dependem as definições locais.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert from a given type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"> </xref> podem converter de um determinado tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> being queried for conversion support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a ser consultados para suporte à conversão.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"> </xref> pode converter; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert to a given type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"> </xref> pode converter para um determinado tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> being queried for conversion support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a ser consultados para suporte à conversão.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"></xref> can convert; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Windows.CultureInfoIetfLanguageTagConverter"> </xref> pode converter; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts a given object type to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte um tipo de objecto fornecido a um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object whose value is respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objecto cujo valor é respeitado durante a conversão.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> being converted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to a given object type.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto para um tipo de objeto fornecido.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object whose value is respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objecto cujo valor é respeitado durante a conversão.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objecto que representa o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>converter.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the returned converted object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do objeto devolvido convertido.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A converted CultureInfo object to a given object type.
trans-unit.target: Um objecto CultureInfo convertido para um tipo de objeto fornecido.
